org.eclipse.january.metadata

Interface MetadataType

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ARPESMetadata, AxesMetadata, DimensionMetadata, ErrorMetadata, IExtendedMetadata, IMetadata, MaskMetadata, OriginMetadata, PeemMetadata, StatisticsMetadata<T>, UnitMetadata
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DynamicConnectionInfo, Metadata

    public interface MetadataType
extends Serializable, Cloneable
    This is a marker interface for all metadata items which can be associated with a dataset.

    All sub-interfaces must have an initialize method and all implementations must have a null constructor.

    Extending sub-interfaces of MetadataType is strongly discouraged. That is, metadata interfaces (sub-interfaces of MetadataType) should be considered to be "final". This simplifies the implementation of IMetadataProvider.getMetadata(Class), etc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MetadataType clone()
      Make a deep copy of metadata

      • clone

        Make a deep copy of metadata
